actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition

official_title: To amend the Hunger Prevention Act of 1988 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to purchase, process, and distribute milk to States for distribution through soup kitchens.
short_title: Hunger Prevention and Nutrition Expansion Act of 1990

summary.text: Hunger Prevention and Nutrition Expansion Act of 1990 - Amends the Hunger Prevention Act of 1988 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to purchase and distribute $10,000,000 worth of milk to soup kitchens in each of FY 1991 through 1995.

titles.title: Hunger Prevention and Nutrition Expansion Act of 1990
To amend the Hunger Prevention Act of 1988 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to purchase, process, and distribute milk to States for distribution through soup kitchens.
